document_data.History:
Scholars from [[Candlekeep]] believed that ferrodracos were an evolved and more intelligent species of the ''[[Ignidraco]]'' genus. It was theorized that, unlike the ferocious [[inficedraco]]s, ''Ferrodraco'' species favored an intellectual and more social behavior, developing a level of intelligence superior to that of the inficedracos.

Supporters of the proto-dragon theory believed that metallic dragons mentioned in historical documents written before that period of time, such as the ''[[Parwiccan Cycle]]'' and other similar documents, were in fact members of the ''Ferrodraco'' genus.
